targets.rawSql:
SELECT entity_id, state, last_changed
                        FROM states
                        WHERE entity_id LIKE 'binary_sensor.%door%'
                           OR entity_id LIKE 'binary_sensor.%window%'
                        ORDER BY last_changed DESC
                        LIMIT 20

SELECT last_updated as time, entity_id, state
                        FROM states
                        WHERE entity_id LIKE 'binary_sensor.%motion%'
                        AND last_updated > NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
                        ORDER BY time
